name: SysArc
tag_list: network-support, technical-support, infrastructure-support, server-support, data-vaulting, online-backup, disaster-recovery, it-support-services, virginia, maryland, washington-dc
overview:
SysArc is a provider of network support, network services and computer support to companies in Maryland, Virginia and the District of Columbia.

Headquartered in Rockville, Maryland, and with locations in Washington DC, and Reston Virginia, SysArc, Inc. provides information technology and network infrastructure support and services that help solve the complex and persistent technology challenges and problems consistently faced by small and mid-sized businesses in todayâ€™s increasingly complex technical environments.

Their technical support and IT consulting services can be customized by their Certified engineers to meet your unique technical needs and requirements and provide you with a scalable support plan that considers any potential budget constraints.

Their current service offerings include:

Network Support Services Computer Support Services Computer Repair Onsite and Remote Computer Repair Technical Support Technical Services Tech Spend Analysis Vendor Transition Plans Network Management Managed Services IT Support IT Consulting IT Outsourcing Emergency Computer Support Computer Support and Maintenance Plans 24/7 Server Monitoring and Maintenance Helpdesk Support Services for Windows PCâ€™s and Laptops Online Backup and Disaster Recovery Solutions Disaster Recovery Planning and Programs Managed Co-Location Network Assessments Network Design, Installation and Integration CAT 6 Cabling CISCO Installation and Support Citrix Consultants Server and Desktop Installation VMware Support Data Center Moves and Relocation Proactive Network Monitoring Server and Desktop Virtualization Hosted Exchange Security Audit Preparation Microsoft Exchange Implementation and Support
